Class JSwordPassageServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
com.tyndalehouse.step.core.service.jsword.impl.JSwordPassageServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
JSwordPassageService
@Singleton public class JSwordPassageServiceImpl extends Object implements JSwordPassageService
a service providing a wrapper around JSword

    • getOsisTextByVerseNumbers

      public OsisWrapper getOsisTextByVerseNumbers(String version, String numberedVersion, int startVerseId, int endVerseId, List<LookupOption> lookupOptions, String interlinearVersion, Boolean roundReference, boolean ignoreVerse0)
      Description copied from interface: JSwordPassageService
      Given a verse number, we lookup the verse in question and return it. The numberedVersion is assumed to be KJV (i.e. KJV is used for the number lookup)
      Specified by:
      getOsisTextByVerseNumbers in interface JSwordPassageService
      Parameters:
      version - the version to use for the passage lookup
      numberedVersion - the version to be used to lookup the ordinal verse numbers
      startVerseId - the start of the verse number to look up
      endVerseId - the end of the verse
      lookupOptions - the list of options for the lookup operation
      interlinearVersion - the version to add if there is an interlinear request, or blank if not
      roundReference - true to indicate to include everything to the next chapter.
      ignoreVerse0 - whether to ignore verse 0
      Returns:
      the OsisWrapper containing the text

    • getOsisText

      public OsisWrapper getOsisText(String version, String reference, List<LookupOption> options, String interlinearVersion, InterlinearMode displayMode)
      Description copied from interface: JSwordPassageService
      returns the Osis Text as a String
      Specified by:
      getOsisText in interface JSwordPassageService
      Parameters:
      version - version to lookup
      reference - the reference to lookup
      options - the list of options for the lookup operation
      interlinearVersion - the version to add if there is an interlinear request, or blank if not
      displayMode - the mode with which display the passage text
      Returns:
      the OSIS text in an HTML form

    • getInterleavedVersions

      public OsisWrapper getInterleavedVersions(String[] versions, String reference, List<LookupOption> options, InterlinearMode displayMode, String userLanguage)
      Description copied from interface: JSwordPassageService

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      versions - the list of versions
      reference - the reference to be looked up in each version
      options - the list of options to use in the proper OSIS conversion
      displayMode - the mode with which display the passage text

    • setOptions

      protected void setOptions(org.crosswire.common.xml.TransformingSAXEventProvider tsep, List<LookupOption> options, org.crosswire.jsword.book.Book[] books)
      This method sets up the options for the XSLT transformation. Note: the set of options is trimmed to those actually available
      Parameters:
      tsep - the xslt transformer
      options - the options available
      books - the version to initialise a potential interlinear with
